review: The only reason I ordered the firestick was to streasm MLBTV.com games through my big screen TV........so far, it's brutal! Very very choppy, meaning it pauses every 4-5 seconds it feels like. And if the issue is bandwidth from my internet provider, that's not it, because before I used my laptop and it worked great, but I wished to watch the games on my TV, yet it doesn't work well? Has to be the firestick and nothing to do with my internet. Plus, when I check to see if I have enough bandwidth, the minimum it states for HD mlbtv.com viewing is 3000, well I measured it through their siute and I have 5500, which if I'm correct is almost double of what the minimum should be, so again, if I can view it completely fine on my laptop and when I get the firestick I cannot....guess what the issue is. I think I'm going to send back and get a Chromecast unless issues are solved.
